tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE actuarial_data (
    policy_number INT,
    policy_holder_name VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    coverage_amount DECIMAL,
    risk_factor DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE Policyholders (
    policy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender CHAR(1),
    policy_start_date DATE,
    policy_end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Claims (
    claim_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_id INT,
    claim_date DATE,
    claim_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    claim_reason VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE Policies (
    policy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_holder_id INT REFERENCES PolicyHolders(policy_holder_id),
    policy_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Policies (
    policy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_type VARCHAR(50),
    policyholder_id INT,
    start_date DATE,
    expiration_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Policyholders (
  policyholder_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  name TEXT,
  age INT,
  gender TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Policies (
  policy_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  policy_type TEXT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  premium DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE Claims (
  claim_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  policy_id UUID,
  claim_date DATE,
  amount DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE Beneficiaries (
  beneficiary_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  policy_id UUID,
  name TEXT,
  relationship TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE PolicyHistory (
  history_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  policy_id UUID,
  action TEXT,
  action_date DATE
)
